title: Tasawwuf
description: A collection of miniature paintings inspired by Sufism and Rumi’s vision of solitude with God. Each piece reflects stages of spiritual awakening, inner freedom, and the unfolding of divine presence.

paintings.name: Whisper of Solitude
paintings.materials: Gouache, gold leaf, handmade wasli paper
paintings.process: Layered washes, micro detailing, dry-brush textures
paintings.description: Captures the sacred silence where the soul communes with the Divine.

paintings.name: Light of Repentance
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: A gentle illumination of the heart’s return to purity.

paintings.name: Sanctuary Within
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Depicts the inner refuge where identity dissolves into divine presence.

paintings.name: Waiting at the Threshold
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Symbolizes patience and surrender before the doorway to God.

paintings.name: Heaven Embracing Earth
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: A union of spiritual and worldly realms in harmony.

paintings.name: Unfolding of the Heart
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Represents the gradual revelation of divine truth within the seeker.

paintings.name: Freedom Beyond the World
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Echoes Rumi’s vision of liberation more precious than life itself.

paintings.name: Loneliness with God
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: A portrayal of the sacred solitude where the soul meets the Eternal.

paintings.name: The Eternal Moment
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Captures the timeless instant of union with the Divine.

paintings.name: Metanoia
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: A spiritual transformation, the turning of the soul toward God.
